artwork:
ADMIN_CMD_t = 0x00:32 AUTH_CMD_t = 0x01:32 FILE_CMD_t = 0x02:32 PROTO_CMD_t = 0x03:32
; Define a SEQ_t (sequence) type. SEQ_t = uint32_t
; Define a CMD_t (command) type. CMD_t = uint32_t
; Define a CmdPayload_t (blob of data) type. ; The length of CmdPayload is determined by the CMD. CmdPayload_t = *uint8_t
PacketBody = SEQ_t CMD_t (AdminPayload / AuthPayload / FilePayload / PROTOPayload)
